properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 34 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 32-29.00N 019-43.00E
AT 012248Z NOV. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,

OR MRCC ROME,
